description: Abbreviation for Social Phobia. Antonym: She Niu (Social Butterfly). Related: She Za, She Leng.

examples.chinese: 人越多越局促,见的人越多越社恐
examples.translation: The more people there are, the more uncomfortable I feel; the more people I see, the more anxious I get.

examples.chinese: 啥时候可以面试不紧张呢,社恐人哭哭
examples.translation: When will I stop being nervous at interviews? Crying in social anxiety.
